name: EndZoneFootball
0:
”Alexa, play End Zone Football”
”Run Play Number 2”
”Customize Lineup”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: end zone football
des:
This is a football simulation game where you call the plays with your voice. Start by receiving the ball and your team - the Blackbears - are down, but have one more possession and looking to make a comeback.

You control the game by calling out plays - either running or passing. Just call them out by saying something like "Pass Play Two" and see if you can move the ball down the field and score! Say 'Customize Lineup' if you would like to set individual player names for the Blackbears.

Blackbears Playbook
Run Play 1 - Running Back Sweep
Run Play 2 - Running Back Pitch Right
Run Play 3 - Full Back Off Tackle
Run Play 4 - Quarterback Keeper

Pass Play 1 - Running Back Outlet
Pass Play 2 - Tight End Out Pattern
Pass Play 3 - Wide Receiver Slant Pattern
Pass Play 4 - Wide Receiver Deep Fade

If you have Echo buttons, just set them up at the beginning, then use them to control the game.

This skill offers a premium version. With it, you can play additional game scenarios where the score changes and the ball starting point from the free version.

To hear the complete playbook, just say "Read Playbook". Here are some tips.
- For running plays, the lower the number, the greater chance to break a big one.
- For passing plays, the lower the number, the higher completion rate - but with a safe throw comes shorter yardage.

At any time, you can attempt a field goal, but watch out. The further away you are, the lower the likelihood that it will be successful.

Enjoy the game!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
